name: Chinese Takeout!
description:
Chinese Takeout! is a fighting game in development, reminiscent of classic NES game Ye Ar Kung Fu.

The Shaolin Express is the greatest Chinese Restaurant in Chinatown, all thanks to their secret recipes passed down from ancient China. But suddenly, a notorious gang known as the Kung Fu Hustlers come and steal all of the restaurant's secret recipes. It's up to Kung Pow, Head Chef & Kung Fu master, to get them back!

Please leave your feedback.
